org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom

Interface IMaskingNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFXGNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupNode, PlaceObjectNode

    public interface IMaskingNode
extends IFXGNode
    Marker interface to imply node can be used to create a mask.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GraphicContext createGraphicContext() 
      int getMaskIndex() 
      void setMaskIndex(int index)
      Records the index of this mask in the parent DisplayObject's list of children.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.dom.IFXGNode

        addChild, getChildren, getDocumentNode, getDocumentPath, getEndColumn, getEndLine, getNodeName, getNodeURI, getStartColumn, getStartLine, setAttribute, setDocumentNode, setEndColumn, setEndLine, setStartColumn, setStartLine

    • Method Detail

      • createGraphicContext

        GraphicContext createGraphicContext()

      • getMaskIndex

        int getMaskIndex()
        Returns:
        the index of a mask in a parent DisplayObject's list of children. This can be used to access the mask programmatically at runtime.

      • setMaskIndex

        void setMaskIndex(int index)
        Records the index of this mask in the parent DisplayObject's list of children. (Optional).
        Parameters:
        index - - the child index to the mask
